mapper.sql: select ORGANIZATION_MEETINGS_ID, PLAN_ID, MEETINGS_NAME, MEETINGS_TIME, MEETINGS_PLACE, PARTICIPANTS_ID, PARTICIPANTS_NAME, ORGANIZATION_TYPE, MEETINGS_CONTENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_organization_meetings
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID, u.PLAN_ID, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.created_time, count(o.UNITS_ID) AS count, o.ORGANIZATION_TYPE from inspection_units u left join inspection_Organization_Meetings o on u.UNITS_ID = o.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID, ORGANIZATION_TYPE order by u.created_time, u.UNITS_ID desc
